title: 12 Beautiful Boutique Hotels in Goa
text:
12 Beautiful Boutique Hotels in Goa The Pick of Goa's Boutique Hotels By Sharell Cook Updated May 19, 2016 . 
Want to stay somewhere unique and intimate? These enticing Goa boutique hotels all offer something different, from heritage accommodations to secluded luxury, and of course outstanding personalized service. Rates do vary widely according to the time of year and generous discounts of up to 50% (or more!) are commonly offered from April until the end of September, during the summer and monsoon season. Note: the rates stated in this article are for the beginning of the tourist season in October. Click on the links to compare prices and get the best deals for each hotel. 
If you're not familiar with Goa's coastline, have a read of this Guide to Goa Beaches to find out which area you should stay in. Pousada Tauma 1. Architecture: Pousada Tauma, Calangute 
This remarkably constructed and landscaped boutique hotel is located at the corner of Arpora and Calangute, about 15 minutes walk from the beach. Its architecture is magnificent and has a number of interesting features. Once you're inside this luxurious and exotic place, the rest of the world will feel far, far away. It offers guests Ayurvedic treatment to help replenish body and soul. A free beach shuttle service is provided. Read reviews on Tripadvisor. Address: Near D'Mart, Porba Vaddo, Calangute, North Goa. Ph: +91 (832) 2279061. Price: From â‚¬210 (15,800 rupees) per night, plus tax. Breakfast, lunch or dinner is included. Features: 12 suites with individual themes, all scattered around a swimming pool with bar. 
continue reading below our video Best Road Trip Apps 2. Adults Only: Casa Severina, Calangute 
Gloriously restored Casa Severina is more like a home than a boutique hotel, and it will take you back to a bygone era. Decorated in Spanish-Portuguese style and surrounded by landscaped gardens, it has a convenient yet peaceful location between Calangute and Candolim beaches. Address: Senhor Francisco Road, near Saint Anthony's Chapel, Gaura Vaddo, Calangute, North Goa. Ph: +91 (832) 2275696. Price: From around 5,500 rupees per night, plus tax. Breakfast is included. Features: Two rooms and 17 suites with balconies, and outdoor swimming pool. Children below 12 years old are discouraged, so guests aren't disturbed.
